greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of denominators of the coefficient of x^m in the n-th Bernoulli polynomial, 0 <= m <= n.
comment: The numerator triangle is found under A196838.
This is the row reversed triangle A053383.
link: D. H. Lehmer, A new approach to Bernoulli polynomials, The American mathematical monthly 95.10 (1988): 905-911.
formula: See the Graham et al. reference given in A196838, eq. (7.80), p. 354.
example: For the start of the rational triangle A196838(n,m)/a(n,m) see the example section in A196838.
xref: Three versions of coefficients of Bernoulli polynomials: A053382/A053383; for reflected version see A196838/A196839; see also A048998 and A048999.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 23 2011
ext: Name edited by _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 09 2020
